content:
TITLE: Starting Development Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for Cherry Studio. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/dev.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Cherry Studio for Different Operating Systems DESCRIPTION: Commands to build Cherry Studio for Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/dev.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # For windows $ yarn build:win # For macOS $ yarn build:mac # For Linux $ yarn build:linux ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Yarn Package Manager DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable corepack and prepare Yarn v4.6.0 for package management. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/dev.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` corepack enable corepack prepare yarn@4.6.0 --activate ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the Cherry Studio project using Yarn. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/dev.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies with Yarn DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using Yarn package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/dev.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Describing Cherry Studio Database in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown snippet explains that Cherry Studio relies on data files generated from a database. It instructs users to contact the developers to obtain the actual database file. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/packages/database/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # Cherry Studio Database Cherry Studio 依赖的数据文件由这个数据库来生成，数据库文件请联系开发者获取 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Buy Me a Coffee Sponsor Image DESCRIPTION: HTML div element with centered alignment containing an image link for the 'Buy Me a Coffee' sponsorship platform. The image is styled with a specific width of 280 pixels. SOURCE: https://github.com/cherryhq/cherry-studio/blob/main/docs/sponsor.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
```
